items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t want to speak about his private life.
When I hear that song, I remember my younger days.
Tom had just turned on the TV when the fuses blew.
Tom had something he needed to talk to Mary about.
Luckily, I was able to talk Tom out of doing that.
Many TV programs have a bad influence on children.
Mary and Alice both married men younger than them.
Mary came into the living room wearing a bathrobe.
Mary cut herself while she was chopping up onions.
Please turn off the light before leaving the room.
